sourcesContent:
Lista de Compras

Não tem itens na lista import { Component, DoCheck, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Item } from 'src/app/interfaces/item'; import { ShoppingListService } from './service/shopping-list.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit, DoCheck { title = 'app-lista-de-compras'; shoppingList!: Array; editingItem!: Item; constructor( private shoppingListService: ShoppingListService ) { } ngDoCheck(): void { this.shoppingListService.saveLocalStorage() } ngOnInit(): void { this.shoppingList = this.shoppingListService.getShoppingList(); console.log(this.shoppingList) } editItem(item: Item) { this.editingItem = item } deleteItem(id: number) { const index = this.shoppingList.findIndex(item => item.id === id) this.shoppingList.splice(index, 1) } }
